title: Partner visas (apply in Australia)
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== (Subclasses 820 and 801) Partner visas (apply in Australia) Allows the partner or spouse of an Australian citizen, Australian permanent resident or eligible New Zealand citizen to live in Australia. You apply for the temporary and the permanent partner visas together. Basic Eligibility In most circumstances, you must be the spouse (married) or de facto partner of an: Australian citizen Australian permanent resident or eligible New Zealand citizen Subclass 820 Partner visa (Temporary) This visa lets the de facto partner or spouse of an Australian citizen, Australian permanent resident or eligible New Zealand citizen live in Australia temporarily. Getting this visa is the first step towards a permanent Partner visa (subclass 801). ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​T his is a temporary visa This leads directly to the permanent Partner visa You must be in Australia when you apply Stay Temporarily until your permanent Partner visa (subclass 801) application is finalised or you withdraw your application. Cost From AUD9,365.00 for most applicants. From AUD1,560.00 for Prospective Marriage visa (subclass 300) holders. Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. Details Subclass 801 Partner visa (Permanent) This visa lets the de facto partner or spouse of an Australian citizen, Australian permanent resident or eligible New Zealand citizen live in Australia permanently. It is usually only for people who currently hold a temporary Partner visa (subclass 820). ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This is a permanent visa You must hold a temporary Partner visa (subclass 820) Stay Permanently. Cost You paid for this visa when you made your applications for the temporary and permanent Partner visas. Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. The processing time for a permanent Partner visa starts from the date of eligibility. This is 2 years after you applied for the temporary and permanent Partner visas Details

===== main placeholder ==========================================

(Subclasses 820 and 801)

(Subclasses 820 and 801)

# Partner visas (apply in Australia)

Partner visas (apply in Australia)

Allows the partner or spouse of an Australian citizen, Australian permanent resident or eligible New Zealand citizen to live in Australia.

Allows the partner or spouse of an Australian citizen, Australian permanent resident or eligible New Zealand citizen to live in Australia.

You apply for the temporary and the permanent partner visas together.

You apply for the temporary and the permanent partner visas together.

### Basic Eligibility

Basic Eligibility

In most circumstances, you must be the spouse (married) or de facto partner of an:

In most circumstances, you must be the spouse (married) or de facto partner of an:
- Australian citizen
Australian citizen
- Australian permanent resident or
Australian permanent resident or
- eligible New Zealand citizen
eligible New Zealand citizen
Subclass 820

## Partner visa (Temporary)

Partner visa (Temporary)
This visa lets the de facto partner or spouse of an Australian citizen, Australian permanent resident or eligible New Zealand citizen live in Australia temporarily. Getting this visa is the first step towards a permanent Partner visa (subclass 801).
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This is a temporary visa
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​T
his is a temporary visa
- This leads directly to the permanent Partner visa
This leads directly to the permanent Partner visa
- You must be in Australia when you apply
You must be in Australia when you apply
Stay

Temporarily until your permanent Partner visa (subclass 801) application is finalised or you withdraw your application.

Temporarily until your permanent Partner visa (subclass 801) application is finalised or you withdraw your application.

FromAUD9,365.00for most applicants. From AUD1,560.00 for Prospective Marriage visa (subclass 300) holders.

Details
Subclass 801

## Partner visa (Permanent)

Partner visa (Permanent)
This visa lets the de facto partner or spouse of an Australian citizen, Australian permanent resident or eligible New Zealand citizen live in Australia permanently. It is usually only for people who currently hold a temporary Partner visa (subclass 820).
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This is a permanent visa
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This is a permanent visa
- You must hold a temporaryPartner visa (subclass 820)
You must hold a temporary
Partner visa (subclass 820)
Stay

Permanently.

Permanently.
Cost

You paid for this visa when you made your applications for the temporary and permanent Partner visas.

You paid for this visa when you made your applications for the temporary and permanent Partner visas.
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

The processing time for a permanent Partner visa starts from the date of eligibility.This is 2 years after you applied for the temporary and permanent Partner visas.
